name: Discord Rich Presence
author: Navidrome Team
description: Discord Rich Presence integration for Navidrome

users.reason: To process scrobbles on behalf of users

http.reason: To communicate with Discord API, image uploads, Spotify track resolution via ListenBrainz, and fetch the Navidrome logo overlay

websocket.reason: To maintain real-time connection with Discord gateway

cache.reason: To store connection state and sequence numbers

scheduler.reason: To schedule heartbeat messages and activity clearing

artwork.reason: To get track artwork URLs for rich presence display

subsonicapi.reason: To fetch track artwork data for image hosting upload

clientid.title: Discord Application Client ID
clientid.description: The Client ID from your Discord Developer Application. Create one at https://discord.com/developers/applications

activityname.title: Activity Name Display
activityname.description: Choose what to display as the activity name in Discord Rich Presence

uguuenabled.title: Upload artwork to uguu.se (enable if Navidrome is not publicly accessible)

navlogooverlay.title: Show Navidrome logo overlay on album art
navlogooverlay.description: Displays the Navidrome logo as a small overlay in the corner of the album artwork in Discord

users.title: User Tokens
users.description: Discord tokens for each Navidrome user. WARNING: Store tokens securely!

username.title: Navidrome Username
username.description: The Navidrome username to associate with this Discord token

token.title: Discord Token
token.description: The user's Discord token (keep this secret!)
